frame.name: Aesthetics
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> is judged to be sensually pleasing or intellectually interesting to a (generally implicit) <fen>Judge</fen>.
<ex>We saw this <t>beautiful</t> <fex name="Ent">boat</fex> with the red sails several times</ex> <ex>We camped here on the beach and had an <fex name="Deg">absolutely</fex> <t>lovely</t> <fex name="Entity">early morning walk through farm fields</fex></ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular gradable <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
</def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition: <def-root>The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the implicit value either from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Entity</fen> has a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Viewpoint
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual who judges the <fen>Entity</fen>'s aesthetics.
<ex>She has always been <t>beautiful</t> <fex name="Viewpoint">to me</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.</def-root>
